arStrings.szText:
{if:SF_18}{c_label}冷却时间: {/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c} 秒
{/if}{if:SF_19}{c_label}使用次数: {/c} {c_resource}{SF_2}{/c} 
{c_label}充能冷却时间: {/c_label} {c_resource}{Recharge Time}{/c} 秒
{/if}释放一股寒霜洪流, {c_important}{u}冻结{/u}{/c}周围的敌人, 持续 {c_number}{buffduration:FREEZE}{/c} 秒。
{if:SF_18}{icon:bullet,1.2}冷却时间{icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}{Cooldown Time}{/c} {/if}{if:SF_19}{icon:bullet,1.2}充能冷却时间{icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}{Recharge Time}{/c} {/if}
消灭被{c_important}寒霜新星{/c}{c_important}{u}冻结{/u}{/c}的敌人会使其冷却时间缩短 {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} 秒, 每次施放最多缩短 {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} 秒。
{c_important}寒霜新星{/c}会使敌人陷入{c_important}{u}易伤{/u}{/c}状态, 持续 {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} 秒。对首领提高至 {c_number}{SF_9}{/c} 秒。
{c_important}寒霜新星{/c}每命中一名敌人, 都会生成 {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} 点法力。
